column2: You know, people have been trying to fling things out of airplanes at targets for over 100 years, now...
... But for the longest time, it was mostly up to chance and luck if you hit. Care to improve those statistics?

Uh-oh! I'm detecting that Missile Math isn't installed! You need to download it from the App Center if you want to play. Click the icon named App Center on the Desktop, then search for the program you want to install.
Pilot your plane to victory with the power of mathematics!
